STBLKeyStringList.Text: The stars at night, are big and bright!
The world through the eyes of a toddler is shining, shimmering splendor!
Too fast, TOO FAST! That slide is scary!
Get out! It's Mine! Mine, Mine.... MINE!
The tunnel, go through the tunnel!
A fun explosion of colorful balls!

Just about any old fence can keep a toddler out, but when you want to keep a toddler safely in, you need Trapped Tots Fencing. Parents can rest easy, knowing their tyke won't be wandering out of sight from their watchful eyes.
Parents, don't do the heavy lifting for your next family picnic. Pack a meal into the Cool Kids Cooler, and watch your little ones fight over the privilege of dragging the food along!
For the rough and tumble outdoors lovin' youngin' in your life comes the Tiny Tot Treehouse. Nymphs, dryads, fairies, and sprites come out and play to your kid's delight!

Trapped Tots Fencing, keeping your tykes safe. The safety latch has an easy to remember unlocking mechanism to allow adults easy traversal. Just pull up twice, push down twice, then left, right, left, right, push in, pull out... and you're through!
A high-tech heat ray in the hood of the Quadpod ensures an even cook every single time. That's not to say that you won't burn your hot dogs... just rest assured that the problem lies with you.

If you love your toddler, you'll make room for a Bam BAM BamCo Ball Pit in your home... at least that's what the marketing department at BamCo would argue. Filled to the brim with colorful balls, toddlers will dive right in and have a blast!
Bam BAM BamCo Toddler Ball Pit

Hot metal playground slides are a thing of the past... introducing the BamCo Safety Slide, a plastic slide for 21st century sensibilities. Tested to last in both indoor and outdoor usage, it'll quickly become a favorite of your little tyke! Not only is it fun to use, the climber will help teach valuable movement skills. You'll marvel at how swiftly they start scampering up the side to slide!

While traditionally sold to commercial venues, the fine folks at BamCo recognized that their All-Inclusive Jungle Gym spoke to a growing market niche - helicopter parents. Instead of going to the playground, why not bring the playground to you? With BamCo's Jungle Gym monopolizing your backyard, your toddler will never leave your sights.

What's the best way to occupy an inquisitive toddler's time? Send them into BamCo's Twisty Tunnels - a series of tubes that toddlers will crawl through and explore for hours on end. While this impressive structure is more commonly found in restaurants and parks, there's no quicker way to show off just how much you love your little tot! At the end of the day, isn't one-upping other neighborhood parents what child rearing is all about?

A string of outdoor lights, appropriate for any fun occasion that you don't want to cut short when the sun goes down.\n\nTip: Place multiple Lightropes in a row, then use the "Lightrope Pole" to hold up the other end of the string.

Troublesome toddlers throwing tantrums? Place them on The Brat Mat to work out their aggression! This rubber surface comes in a number of fun patterns to grab a tot's attention and jump start their imagination. It's the perfect surface to inspire play!

The Packanack Blanket inspires thoughts of the simple pleasures in life. Spread them outdoors to set the scene for a tasty picnic, or lay back and gaze up at the clouds. Rest assured that its durable woven material is resistant to the toughest stains and splatters.
Don't pop these balloons too soon, or they'll turn from Party Poppers to party poopers.

Some say the lightrope pole is used by nimble Sims to help balance themselves when navigating a tightrope. Those people are wrong.\n\nIt's a pole. It holds up the other end of the "High-Wire Lightrope" string lights. That's it.
Vita means life - and using these sail shades to protect your skin from harsh UV rays is a sure fire way to stay looking younger, longer.
Whatcha gonna do with all these stumps... all these stumps you saved from the dump. My stump, my stump, my stump, my lovely little stumps.
Whatcha gonna do with all these stumps... all these stumps you saved from the dump. My stump, my stump, my stump, my lovely little stumps.
Whatcha gonna do with all these stumps... all these stumps you saved from the dump. My stump, my stump, my stump, my lovely little stumps.
Whatcha gonna do with all these stumps... all these stumps you saved from the dump. My stump, my stump, my stump, my lovely little stumps.
You're ready to party at a moment's notice... and now, so is your food! Disposable plates, cups, silverware, and napkins are at your disposal for any occasion. Party on!
Straight from the back lot in Bridgeport comes surplus director's chairs. Used in the production of films such as "Diamonds Are For Sims", "Simder", "Sims of the Dead", and many more!

Take a load off on the Plump Pillow Pad! A dense memory foam packing will provide the support you need to comfortably relax.\n\n...just be sure to give it a thorough shake first to remove that pesky purple packing powder,

The government says that HDPE stands for high-density polyethylene, and we're required to inform you that this table is 100% built from it. We prefer to think of HDPE as Hungry Diners Picnic Extravaganza - the perfect surface for an outdoor feast!

Eight renowned artists collaborated on designs for this joyous toybox! You can feel good knowing that no matter which one you choose, all proceeds are being donated directly to the Toys For Tykes charity.
Part of Mr. Chip, not to worry, Mr. Chip is safe and sound.
Must know a toddler with level 2 Imagination Skill.

Everyone seems to have had a decent time at the play date... There's one easy way to take your next play date to the next level though. Adorable animal plates. That's right, and you'll find that a set of them have been placed in your household inventory for free! The cute little lion face printed on them is sure to be a hit the next time the tots get together.
\nBronze Level rewards the household with a set of cute lion plates.

Word of this legendary play date has started to spread... In fact, the fine folks in the marketing department at BamCo (esteemed maker of toddler toys) has reached out with a special "influencer" opportunity! They've provided their All-Inclusive Jungle Gym set, completely free of charge! You'll find that it's already been delivered to your household's inventory. All they ask is a small, tiny, little favor... Won't you please place it in your front yard and invite all the neighbor's tots over to play, to help spread the good BamCo name?
\nGold Level rewards the household with an all inclusive Toddler Jungle Gym.

The play date was a great success! The little tots were bouncing all over as they played, frolicked, and strengthened friendships that will last for years to come. You know what really ramps up a toddler's excitement though? Balloons! Lots and lots of balloons! You'll find a whole cluster of them in your household's inventory... be sure to decorate with them for the next play date!
\nSilver Level rewards the household with a colorful cluster of balloons.

Host a big party for tiny tots! Invite all the toddlers your little one knows for fun, play, and general merriment. While the tykes run to and fro, grill up some food and exchange parenting tips with fellow caregivers.
Read a Book to a Toddler
Have a Toddler Climb up the Slide
Click on a Slide and select Help Toddler Climb
Click on a Slide while a toddler is sitting on top and select Help Slide.
Purchase the Toddler Jungle Gym in Build Mode.
Purchase a Toddler Slide in Build Mode.
Purchase the Toddler Tunnels in Build Mode.
Go to Build Mode and purchase a Toddler Ball Pit.
Your toddler has been invited to a play date. Get ready for lots of fun, love, and chaos!
You've been invited to a play date. Get ready for lots of fun, love, and chaos!
It's your play date... Go forth and have fun!
Be a fun host to the toddlers and their caregivers that are attending the play date.
Must be a toddler aged household member.
